root.name: Neutopia II
root.description: OverviewNeutopia II is a blend of the adventure and RPG genres. Using items like bombs, rings, boomerangs and whips you explore a large area. Caves contain chests that contain items that can help or harm you.Critical ReceptionWhen released Electronic Gaming Monthly issued the following scores, 7,8,7,6 adding, "...The quest is still a lot like Zelda and doesn;t branch out enough, but its length has been increased and it will take a while to get through the game".

similar_games.game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past & Four Swords
